Marketing.name: Stockpile
Marketing.slogan: Warehouse management for small and medium businesses: simple, effective, affordable.

Metadata.title: Stockpile | Warehouse Management
Metadata.description: Stockpile is a warehouse management system for small businesses.

Errors.email-not-usable: Email not usable. Try with a different email.
Errors.email-not-found: Email address not found. Please check and try again.
Errors.wrong-credentials: Incorrect email or password. Please verify and try again.
Errors.2fa-token-invalid: Invalid verification code. Please verify and try again.
Errors.2fa-token-expired: Verification code expired. Request a new code.
Errors.psw-reset-token-invalid: Unable to create new password. Invalid token.
Errors.psw-reset-token-expired: Unable to create new password. Token expired.

Success.confirmation-email-sent: Confirmation email sent. Check your inbox.
Success.2FA-email-sent: Verification code sent. Check your inbox.

Auth.policy: By continuing, you agree to our <termsLink>Terms of Service</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

Login.footnote: Enter your credentials to access the account

Register.footnote: Enter the required credentials to create your account

Reset.heading: Forgot Password?
Reset.footnote: Enter the email address you used to create your account, and we'll send you a link to reset it.

NewPassword.heading: Create New Password
NewPassword.footnote: Enter and confirm the new password you want to set for your account.

Footnote.expired: The verification link is invalid or expired. Request a new link.
Footnote.success: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now access your account.
Footnote.pending: Please wait while we verify your email.

ContactSupport.error: If the problem persists, please contact support.
ContactSupport.success: For any queries, please contact our support team.

Verify.do-not-close-window: This may take a few moments. Please do not close the page.

OAuth.email-already-in-use: You already have an account with this email.

Wait.heading: Limited Access
Wait.sub-heading: Your account is pending verification. Please wait.
Wait.contact-support: For any queries, please contact our support team.

Dashboard.heading: Dashboard
Dashboard.sub-heading: This is the page where you can get an overview of your work.

Users.heading: Users
Users.sub-heading: From here, you can check who has access to the platform

Confirmation.heading: You are deleting {user}
Confirmation.sub-heading: This action will permanently delete {count, plural, =1 {one user} other {# users}} from the platform.

User.edit-not-found: The user you are trying to edit seems to not exist. Try reloading the page.
User.save-not-found: The user you are trying to save seems to not exist. Try reloading the page.
User.save-without-workspace: The user you are trying to save doesn't seem to be assigned to any workspace. Try reloading the page.

Workspace.edit-not-found: The workspace you tried to select seems to not exist. Try reloading the page.

Errors.delete-self: You cannot delete your own account.

Success.users-deleted: {count, plural, =1 {One user} other {# users}} deleted successfully.
